revision.text: Possibly: A brief survey of the terraqueous globe : containing, I. The description and use of the globes : II. The construction and use of maps : III. Geography; or, a short view of the Earth's surface..., by John Mair. (Edinburgh : Printed for A. Kincaid & J. Bell and W. Gray, Edinburgh, and R. Morison and J. Bisset, Perth, MDCCLXII [1762]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1873209~S1
